name: Babo Army
description:
Created in one week for the Weekly Game Jame 150

Theme: You're the Enemy.

You are one of the evil 'Babo Army' who is working at a factory.

Two heroes were assigned to break in the factory and suddenly shoot everyone. You and the other Babo Armies have to survive and fire back at them.

The armies have one weapon each in their hand to defend themselves.

They sometimes leave their weapon on the ground when they die. You can pick it up to change your weapon or when you have run out of bullets.

Can you collect scores while surviving?
